description:
This mini-course introduces the data-modeling component of UML, and describes
how UML diagrams are translated to relations. It will be available for an
extended period of time. We anticipate the content will be available at least
until June 9th, 2015. You will be notified by email of any changes to content
availability beforehand.

We have created 14 mini-courses that can be assembled in a variety of ways to
learn about different aspects of databases. Please visit the main Databases
page for suggested pathways and general information, or click View Courseware
above to begin this mini-course.
title: Unified Modeling Language
